# sbb-accordion


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabelledby`     | `aria-labelledby`      | Use the aria-labelledby to reference to an id of a title outside of the accordion. That way we can improve the context for the screenreader users. When the first button in the accordion receives focus, the referenced title is also spoken out by the screenreader. | `string`  | `''`        |
| `nonWhiteBackground` | `non-white-background` | Set this if you want to use the accordion on a non-white background.                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `onlyOneOpen`        | `only-one-open`        | Set this if you want the accordion to always have open only one item.                                                                                                                                                                                                  | `boolean` | `false`     |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                   |
| ----------- | --------------------------------------------- |
| `"unnamed"` | Place sbb-accordion-item elements in the slot |


----------------------------------------------
